website_summaries.verdict: Supportive shoes for walking and running. Reviews about the shoe's durability are mixed.
pros: Lightweight and comfortable, this shoe is good for walking and provides ankle support
Synthetic leather upper with rubber sole
Comes in white with navy/silver and white with navy
Memory foam cushioning, EVA midsole, rubber outsole
cons: Memory foam layer is thinner than expected
For many wearers, the shoes come apart after a few months of wear
Most web sites state this shoe is synthetic leather

customer_reviews.title: Shoe "leather" is peeling off after 3 months of wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in August 2018 and as of November 2018 they are beginning to peel and crack on the surface, especially on the right shoe. I do not abuse these shoes and wear them about 5 days a week for at least 6 hours per day. This if the first time I've purchased Fila shoes and it will probably be the last. Although I initially thought they were comfortable, I am now wondering if my recent lower back problem was caused by these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good upon arrival. Have been wearing them 5 days a week for about a month now. I work in a hospital setting, so no harsh use. They are already starting to separate where the sole and upper meet on the sides. Comfortable, but not worth getting only a months worth of wear before literally coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Sneakers I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I could give it a ZERO rating. These by far are the worst sneakers I have ever owned. Within a month and a half of buying them, the sole of the left sneaker separated from from the upper. I had to glue them back together ! It's a good thing that I didn't throw out my 5 year old Everlasts , so I had something to wear while the glue dried. Now I see that the left side is coming apart. The sneaker is absolute junk !
customer_reviews.author: T M

customer_reviews.title: These are not holding up very well at all.
customer_reviews.text: These are not holding up very well at all. Normally, my shoes (used just for everyday walking around) last a couple of years. After 8 months of very light use, they are fracking on both sides of the forefoot, at the crease. Very disappointed. They are reasonably comfortable, but not for all day.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for The Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting sneakers, but the memory foam is quite thinner than I expected. But, you do get an all leather sneaker that'll last you a LONG time! In my experience and opinion, Files are made to be very tough and will last you a long time as long as you take at least moderate care of them... they're low maintenance shoes for sure! I'm even thinking of buying a second pair of these as all leather sneakers are getting much harder to come by!! The sizing was great as well, since I bought an extra wide, and it felt great out of the box and better as they were broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert De Santis

customer_reviews.title: FILA is just not a good product any longer!
customer_reviews.text: The size was to small and very narrow in the front. The we’re cut very narrow. The quality of the leather was poor. When it bent it look more like cardboard then leather. I had to return these. I was very disappointed in the sneakers. A few years ago the were a good quality product. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: A very good value
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought Fila shoes before, usually New Balance or Asics. I thought I would give these shoes a try as it is getting harder to find leather shoes that are white and considered cross trainers. These came at a great price, so I thought I'd try them and I'm glad I did. They seem to be well made and have settled in to being quite comfortable now that I've worn them for a couple of weaks.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Farina

customer_reviews.title: 4E good choice
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have and arches and my feet are wide. Solely shoes in 4E help me with my balance and relieves my knees. Many companies should make shoes like these. Because they feature memory foam which is very comfortable wide shoes so your feet don't feel crammed. With a very nice Sleek design to them.
customer_reviews.author: 🔥 Hot Shopper D🔥

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Shoes Are Wide Width, Not Medium
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out at first why these shoes fit loose. Then I looked at the box, which showed them as "WIDE 4E," with a tag on the shoe reading "WIDE WIDTH." I ordered 12M, not 12W. Return isn't practical, so I'm stuck with them, and not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: HKEX

customer_reviews.title: Best value you'll find for sneakers theses days.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I didn't want to pay the high ridiculous price that the other brands want. I have had sketches and they don't last but a few months before splitting where the shoe meets sole. Not sure how these will hold up but at half or more of the price the other brands want. I can own 2 pairs or buy a new pair. The reason I gave 4 stars is because at 40 bucks they're still overpriced for a sneaker made in China with synthetic materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: heel boy
customer_reviews.text: did a 45 minute jog with these shoes and the right shoe tore up the back of my heel
customer_reviews.author: A F B

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shoe for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing them for me and won’t be the last. I bought another brand NB that we’re more expensive and they wore out in 4 weeks by walking and or moderate jogging 12 miles a week. So I went back to what is dependable and great quality. Thank you Fila
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I stumbled on them by accident looking for other Fila products. I gave them a try and liked them so much that I bought two more pairs to make sure I could have them in the future, The memory foam inserts are outstanding. All day walking at an amusement park and I was the only one who's feet didn't hurt. Seem to be great quality and they look great. I'm very happy. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Worth It

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoes that crack
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrible. The top simulated leather starting cracking within 30 days. I've bought these shoes before and never had a problem. These are either "knock offs" of Fila has really cheapened their product
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves them. Fits true to size. Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves them. He is an Interior painter and wears white comfortable shoes. Fits him true to size. Very comfortable shoes he says. Very happy with the purchase. He goes through a few shoes a year. I'll probably be buying these for next Christmas as well lol.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Light weight leather sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Low cost leather "light weight" walking shoes available in extra wide comfort. Don't think they would be suitable for regular athletic wear and tear, but very cost effective,comfortable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband used to like the Kirkland shoes from Costco but they are no longer available. This is a perfect substitute and it is a bit more stylish, though he never cares about that!
customer_reviews.author: clb

customer_reviews.title: Right after unboxing I went on a mile and a half walk and I noticed that one of the shoes were lower than the other like one of my legs were shorter than the other ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived after four days after being advertised as Prime two day delivery. Right after unboxing I went on a mile and a half walk and I noticed that one of the shoes were lower than the other like one of my legs were shorter than the other resulting in a strain and pain, swelling in the ankle and Achilles tendon area. I promptly returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great fit !!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for the first time and fit and width are great. Did not hurt feet and for the price, I'd recommend them. Might have to buy a 2nd pair,just to have them around for later.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe but the first pair I had to send back because too small. I have never purchased shoes online at Amazon before but the exchange was painless and I had a new pair the next day. Dropped the original order at the UPS store while wearing my new Fila replacement shoe. They fit nicely but I suggest you go up at least a half size or even full size to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Nice exterior outer material and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these exact shoes. Very comfortable type of shoe. Not as durable as a work. Boot but I buy these for comfort. Great for working in my office. These don't absord water or rain super easy like so many mesh running shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: ObiWannKennobeee

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes of very low quality, were received by me on March 16, 2019, lasted just 2 months. they do not represent the FILA brand at all.
customer_reviews.author: Diego GarcÃ­a

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe strings are too short, but EXCELLENT PURCHASE. Nice fit, comfortable and classy. I really love the fit of this shoe. BUY IT. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Wear as nursing shoes and stay tight fit for entire 12 hour shift. No break in needed. Good traction. Great price for all leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Munsell

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend he just started wearing them he loves to comfort they're light it's like walking on pillows in your shoe I would recommend the shoes to anyone interested in buying them
customer_reviews.author: Angel Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in good condition. The shoes are a little snug but I'm hoping they will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable, and good quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not leather received.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes but the material not what w mentioned in the description. It said leather but when I received it it was man made material. Fits well though only a little tight at the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of these entry level tennis shoes. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: Not Nike
customer_reviews.text: Colin capernick don’t get a nickel of my money when I buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony e buck

customer_reviews.title: ... the back of the left sneaker could have been better, it is different from the right one
customer_reviews.text: Construction on the back of the left sneaker could have been better,it is different from the right one.but they are ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: i like the look
customer_reviews.text: i like the look of the shoes. the memory foam is very soft and makes walking comfortable. if you wear them for an extended time, the memory foam remembers your foot and does not provide the comfort/support it does at first. would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Asarch

customer_reviews.title: Well buildt
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are just as I had hoped. Fit great and are a nice combo of leather and man made. (As stated in product description).

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these to go out. when he’s not wearing his work shoes.

customer_reviews.title: They are not an overly sturdy design, but good for the value
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit from the first wearing without a break-in period which is why I have purchased the same model several times. They are not an overly sturdy design, but good for the value.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: Fila men running shoe
customer_reviews.text: well made leather upper running shoe i take 11 in a Adidas runner so i got 11.5 just to be on the safe side now i am glad i did as 11 would have been a bit tight .

customer_reviews.title: FILA
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly the very first time I tried them on a very good sneaker for your $$$$

customer_reviews.title: They are GREAT, fit is good for me but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: They are GREAT, fit is good for me but I have narrow feet, may be a little tight with regular width feet, length for size 10 is good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great bargain for the quality and price. In retail stores, these sneakers would sell for $50.00

customer_reviews.title: Fit good and very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this fila for my Husband and it fit very good and it's very comfortable..

customer_reviews.title: ... memory foam inside and are very light weight and comfortable. I wear them to walk about 4 miles ...
customer_reviews.text: They have memory foam inside and are very light weight and comfortable. I wear them to walk about 4 miles a day and a great price to.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and uses them for working out

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I always like to try on sneakers before I buy .. But I took a chance... I was pleasantly pleased

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are just as pictured and described! My son loves them! He has been wearing them daily and has stated how comfortable they are!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for Walking Long Distances
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking for exercise but decided to buy a running shoe for the extra support. I wanted a sporty white look at an inexpensive price and these shoes have done the job after several months of use. Not sure about their efficacy for actual hard running per se.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with sizing and price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect for a size 9.5. price was right also.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars.......A little tight but it fits.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really blame Amazon for less than perfect fit... But shoes look really nice with my scrubs..and I got for a decent price on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: More colors needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I ordered. The fit is great. I just need more colors.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My Dad loves his new sneakers, perfect for senior citizens who still like to be stylish.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son he says they are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: What's NOT to like?
customer_reviews.text: You can NOT beat these shoes for value. They outperform the New Balance shoes that I've worn for years, and are less expensive. I walk 4-5 miles a day (in ALL conditions in CT), and these shoes LAST. No obvious design flaws - memory-foam fit - extremely inexpensive - winner.

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service. Tight toe box.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were cute, but did not fit. Returned easily enough thru customer service. Fast and easy.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fits as expected. Seems well constructed for the ...

customer_reviews.title: Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Light Weight

customer_reviews.title: Low quality tread - wears off quickly
customer_reviews.text: Excessive wear on the bottom treads after less than a month of use. Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable without having a large toe look to the shoe. Shoe instantly comfortable right out of the box. I never need a break in period for them either.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got for my dad as a gift he loves them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Existing white leather Fila sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this size Fila sneaker previously and have very pleased, and that's why, I purchased these two pairs.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I put them on they fit well and were comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Plush
customer_reviews.text: Run a little large just got to wear thicker socks.Otherwise nice feeling shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy.
customer_reviews.text: Best budget shoes on the market. Memory foam insoles are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive shoes with comfortable memory foam at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size and it is the perfect fit. They feel great too.

customer_reviews.title: shipped as promised and shoe looks great
customer_reviews.text: They are a little smaller than others. I can still wear them and they do look great.Just add a 1/2 size and they are oerfect.Great price.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Actually it's a 4.5 Star ⭐️ I like a little more cushion.

customer_reviews.title: A decent shoe at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a shoe. It's a fair price. I don't know what the "Memory foam" is supposed to do, but it's a good value for a white trainer.

customer_reviews.title: Material quality is not adequate.
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam of the shoe base gets folded when you wear and walk and remove. Once it gets folded, it’s very uneasy to walk or wear it.

customer_reviews.title: Never enough
customer_reviews.text: Great all around shoe, waiting for someone to carry them again so I can purchase another pair...might even purchase a few more.

customer_reviews.text: I like how fast my item was delivered, but the right shoe feels a little smaller than the left.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe, Excellent Price!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sneakers!

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but good quality

product_meta.title: Fila Men's Memory Sportland Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
These Fila running shoes provide lightweight, cushioning and comfort on all surfaces. The contemporary design and color placement make them very compatible with all athletic and casual apparel.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Synthetic leather. Ethylene vinyl acetate. Memory foam footbed.
